attributes.action: Sign to show you want Out of Eu. Stop the votes being rigged.
attributes.additional_details: Churchill lead us into war and lead us to victory. Our veterans fought for our freedom of speech and freedom to support our own country, yet we have to take our flags down, while foreign people are allowed to express their views and support their own country in our country. It is racism towards the British public that we are not allowed to live free.
attributes.background: Stop the votes being rigged as alot feel that the media have been paid off and only show the remain side of things. We as a country want it back to how it used to be, as our veterans fought for. We as British nationals pay our national insurance and tax for a better Nhs for people who pay for it.
